stories.text: I have a friend in rural Morocco who wants to make a living with computers. He’s 30, can read and write English, but doesn’t know anything about software or web development. He wants to learn so that he can make a living. What are his options and what specific free courses should he study? What is the quickest path to being skilled enough to take on UpWork (or similar) projects?
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you get started as a developer in rural Morocco?

stories.text: 15Five only offers subscription tiers now. They used to provide a free/lite tier with limited seats. Has anyone found a suitable replacement for team/culture management that is free for small groups?
stories.title: Ask HN: 15Five alternatives with a free/lite plan?
